films.name: Luck
films.description: Sam, an 18-year-old orphan girl who has encountered many unfortunate events throughout her life, decides one day to give a lucky coin to her friend Hazel, who will be adopted soon, so that she can bring luck in her next life. After a while, Sam realizes that this lucky coin actually increases his luck and decides to use it to change his own misfortune. But here too, Sam's bad luck continues to haunt him, and the young girl accidentally drops the money into the toilet bowl and flushes it. Sam, who blames himself for this mistake, encounters a black cat he met before and is scolded by the cat for losing the coin. Shocked by this strange event, Sam sees the cat passing through a portal and decides to follow it. After a while, Sam finds himself in a place called the Land of Fortune, where he talks again with this cat named Bob. The young girl learns that she needs a coin to return to her own world, and also learns that if it is heard that she lost the coin in the country, she may be exiled. Sam, who plans to buy another coin from Hazel's coin collection, finds himself encountering strange creatures; He will find himself in an extreme adventure where he will travel with a dragon and try to put an end to his bad luck.

films.name: Who Says We Are Bad? The Bad Guys
films.description: This animated movie tells the story of a team of very evil people doing the greatest evil in the world. Who Said We Are Bad?, which was broadcast in 4k movie format. In the movie, Miss Tarantula, Mr. Wolf, Mr. Piranha, Mr. Shark and Mr. Snake formed the scary evil team. Their aim is to write their names in history as the worst people in the world by stealing something that cannot be stolen. Before this, this team of terrible villains committed various thefts all over the city, but when these thefts were not big enough to make their names known to the whole world, they were unaware of what would happen to them when the team decided to steal an artifact that they could handle and was valuable to everyone.When the team prepares a big plan and starts a robbery, not everything goes as they want. The team that finally caught up is now in the police car and unfortunately they have been caught. When they are caught, Mr. Wolf, the jackal and smartest of the group, comes up with an amazing idea: to make them feel sorry and get away with it. When this idea of ​​making them feel sorry for the other members of the team makes sense, the team that makes them feel sorry for the police gets away with it, which is the strange part. But of course this has a price. But this price will be very difficult for Miss Tarantula, Mr. Wolf, Mr. Piranha, Mr. Shark and Mr. Snake. The only condition and rule to get away with the job is to be good. But this rule will be quite difficult for all of them. This rule set by Professor Marmalede is quite the opposite for the team of terrible villains. Lady Tarantula, Mr. Wolf, Mr. Piranha, Mr. Shark and Mr. Snake, the scary evil team that has entered the hardest period of their lives, have to be good now. This will undoubtedly be the biggest and most difficult test in their lives.

films.name: Entergalactic
films.description: Entergalactic is about the adventures of a young artist named Jabari, who stands out with his creativity and vision. Jabari moves to New York to realize his dreams and finds the inspiration he is looking for in his apartment. When he meets his neighbor Meadow, he embarks on a challenging journey while trying to balance love and success. This film allows us to journey into the inner world of a young artist while also discovering his extraordinary talents. While Entergalactic creatively tells a story full of fantastic elements, it will also make us question the difficult balance between love, art and success.

films.name: The Sea Beast
films.description: Once upon a time, the whole world was fighting against sea monsters, and that's why no country's ships could easily navigate the open oceans. However, there were also a few people who were the nightmare of the giant creatures that owned the seas, and one of these people was Captain Jacob Holland. Captain Jacob Holland was the fearsome monster hunter of the oceans and was not afraid of any monster. Captain Jacob Holland, who made every sea monster he saw his next victim, one day, while resting on one of the islands he frequently visited, came across a little and cute girl, Maisie. Maisie had a great interest in monsters and monster hunters, and so her biggest hero was, of course, Captain Jacob Holland. When little Maisie, who managed to find the captain, struck up a short conversation with him and said she wanted to come with him, it took only seconds for Captain Jacob Holland to refuse her. Captain Jacob Holland did not yet know that he had made the mistake of his life by not taking a little girl seriously.

films.name: Minions
films.description: The movie Minions is about the adventures of Minions to find a new boss for their tribe. In the film, three Minions named Kevin, Stuart and Bob are offered a job by supervillain Scarlett Overkill and her inventor husband Herb. The minions begin to help Scarlett by working in her service. However, in a journey full of unexpected events and funny situations, the Minions embark on a grand adventure to find their boss. Minions offers the audience a laughter-filled experience with its entertaining and funny narrative.

films.name: The Magician's Elephant
films.description: The Magician's Elephant tells a story in which an orphan boy follows what a fortune teller tells him about the arrival of an elephant that will help him find his missing sister.

films.name: Puss in Boots: The Three Diablos
films.description: Puss in Boots: The Three Diablos is an animated film about the adventures of Puss in Boots, the cute and cunning cat from the Shrek series. This story begins with Puss in Boots chasing three petty thieves. Thieves have stolen a magic diamond thanks to his feathers, and Puss in Boots goes after them to bring this diamond back. Throughout this fun adventure, Puss in Boots discovers the importance of friendship and courage as he and his new friends tackle challenging obstacles. Puss in Boots: The Three Diablos is an enjoyable animated film that offers viewers a heart-warming and entertaining movie experience.

films.name: Deep Sea
films.description: A little girl follows her curiosity and steps into the dreamy deep sea world. As he gets lost in the clear waters, he finds himself diving into fascinating depths. In this place where dreams and reality intertwine, there lies a mysterious abyss where secrets are hidden in every corner. Each breath flows in harmony with the ocean's currents. The colorful world of shining sea corals and the graceful dance of sea creatures guide him and make his way to the deepest, unexplored corners of this magical world. As you descend into the depths, the ocean whispers ancient stories, revealing forgotten histories and legendary treasures. In this journey where every moment carries the promise of discovery, he steps deeper to reveal the secrets of hidden corners.

films.name: Happy Feet 2
films.description: Happy Feet Two is an animated series that builds on the success of the first film. The film tells the adventures of Mumble's son Erik as he tries to discover his abilities. Mumble's family and friends face a new threat, and Mumble tries to solve the problem by bringing everyone together. In this film directed by George Miller, the themes of family relations and solidarity are at the forefront. Visually impressive and full of musical scenes, Happy Feet Two offers viewers a delightful animation experience.

films.name: The Amazing Maurice
films.description: The Amazing Maurice is an animated film based on the book of the same name by Terry Pratchett. Magnificent Maurice is a stray cat living in the city and making plans to survive. One day, he meets a piper and a pack of rats and decides to use them in his plan. However, they encounter an unexpected situation in the town where their plans will be implemented. This exciting adventure lets them discover the power of friendship, courage and extraordinary heroism. The Amazing Maurice is a magical film that offers an enjoyable viewing experience for both children and adults.
